title: Was the shooter on the border strip identified as a Middle Eastern man named Abu Hom Krozi?
subtitle: While society was stagnating in the wake of the mass shooting that left 13 people dead, there was an unfounded rumor of Islamophobia, rising fear about the identity of the shooter treated on the Internet.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The shooter, who killed 12 people in a bar in California in November 2018, was identified as Abu-Hum Karuzi.
